SEARCH
Package com.example.queueup.controllers

Class UserController

java.lang.Object
com.example.queueup.controllers.UserController
public class UserController extends Object
UserController is responsible for managing user operations, such as creating, updating, and deleting users in the Firestore database. It also handles device ID retrieval and manages user-specific fields like profile pictures and notification preferences.
